author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

export-for-ai-chat.template.markdownDescription: Handlebars template for the AI chat prompt. Available variables: `items` (array), `hasMultiple`, `workspaceName`, `codeOpener`, `codeCloser`, `blankLine`, `newline`. Each item has: `code`, `languageId`, `language.title`, `language.codeBlockId`, `isWholeFile`, `file`, `fileName`, `fileRelative`

export-for-ai-chat.showNotifications.description: Show notifications after copying code to clipboard

scripts.build_test: fse emptyDir out/test && bun build ./test/code/*.ts --outdir out/test --target node --format cjs  --entry-naming [name].test.cjs --external mocha --external vscode
scripts.clean: fse remove out && fse remove temp && fse remove .vscode-test
scripts.pack: fse emptyDir out/vsix && bun run build && cp license.txt out/bun && cd out/bun && vsce package --out ../vsix/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.vsix
scripts.test: bun test ./test && bun run build && bun run build_test && vscode-test
